query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notifications` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('transfer_approved','transfer_rejected','low_stock','task_assigned','system') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `relatedId` int,
  `relatedType` varchar(50),
  `read` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FfdjCLoumdFxBM.root --database CnvwHcg9Gg9M7uweMepDrE --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notifications` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `type` enum('transfer_approved','transfer_rejected','low_stock','task_assigned','system') NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `message` text NOT NULL,
  `relatedId` int,
  `relatedType` varchar(50),
  `read` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
